trends: There have been 28 other sightings in Golden
There were no other sightings in Golden on or around June 28th 2013
Summary: 4-6 rapidly moving white circular white lights rapidly changing direction
divs: Sighting DetailsDuring a thunderstorm to the east of our home in the foothills west of Denver, we observed 4-6 circular lights moving at a rapid speed and randomly changing direction continually over a 20-30 minute period. These lights were well above the lightning and clouds associated with the thunderstorm and light movements did not seem to be associated in any way with the lighting strikes below.
